issue.title: Problem with HiDPI screen on Ubuntu 18.04

content.raw:
Fixed the issue on Ubuntu 18.04 XPS 15.

Edit the Exec= portion in the “/usr/share/applications/gazebo.desktop“ file to:

Exec=/usr/bin/env QT\_AUTO\_SCREEN\_SCALE\_FACTOR=0 QT\_SCALE\_FACTOR=1.0 /usr/bin/gazebo

It fixed the issue on my machine. If that doesn’t work, check out run\_scaled script on Github.

‌
